Title: Strengthen war preparations, be always prepared to wipe out the encroaching enemy -- Fourth of four propaganda posters in commemoration of the 20th anniversary of Chairman Mao's instruction to "organize contingents of people's militia on a big scale"
Designer: Propaganda Department of the Shanxi Provincial Communist Party Committee (中共山西省委宣传部)Political Department of the Shanxi Provincial Military Region (山西省军区政治部)
